['They congregate near the roads on\noccasion, much like we witnessed,\nand attack unsuspecting travelers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['As it happens, there is a scholar in town\nwho I am told knows a great deal about\nall manner of creatures.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It is my hope that he might\nknow a method to frighten\nthe little devil away, but...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I am unaccustomed to speaking with\nstrangers. Quite fearful of it, actually...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But if you were to perchance accompany\nme, perhaps I might find the courage to\nengage him in conversation?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Th-thank you!\nYou truly are a wonderful person...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Y-yes, actually.\nAbout a particular monster.\nI have, um, questions...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Oho! And I should hope\nI have the answers you seek.\nBy all means, ask away.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Well...there is a wild weasel that\nhas been prowling the pass of late,\npreventing safe travel.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I was wondering if you\nmight know of any ways\nwe could deal with it?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Hmm... Well, I've heard\nthat they are fearful of axes.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Simply waving one around is enough\nto send them running. The sounds is said to\nbe reminiscent of a natural predator of theirs.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["They're wary of axes, are they?\nInteresting...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['You have been most helpful, sir.\nThank you.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It seems we must procure\nan axe or two, then.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["The creatures were fearful of axes,\nwere they not? W-well then, let's\nget this over with...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It...it actually worked.\nThe monster fled in terror.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['That was... Wow. My heart is still pounding\nso loud I can hear it in my head. Is this what\nit feels like to triumph over a beast?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["You've helped me to discover a part of\nmyself I thought I never would. Confidence.\nAlbeit small and fragile, but still...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["And now I can procure the wares I\nneeded as well. You've done me a\ngreat service, my friend.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Oh, um... If I could just have\nanother moment of your time...?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Thank you again for your help in driving off\nthat wild weasel. Because of you, I was able\nto finally get my business underway.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["What little success I've achieved\nI owe all to you. I mean it.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ah, but that's not what I wanted\nto talk about. Not exactly, at least...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["You see, I'm from Red Valley, and\nthere we have an important tradition.\nA rite of passage, as it were.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['We must journey unto a foreign land\nand there hunt down our chosen prey.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["So while I've been earning money as\na merchant, I took the opportunity to\npurchase equipment for my hunt.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['To ensnare the beast and make it\neasier to kill, was my thinking...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But the idea of facing it alone is still, well...\nutterly terrifying, to say the least.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I...I wish to enlist your help in this endeavor.\nIf you are willing and able, that is.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['To be recognized as an adult,\nthe beast I must slay is a mountain goat.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['They frequent North Shepherds Rock Pass.\nAnd there is no better time than the present...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Rather impressive, those horns.\nJust imagine getting skewered\nby one of those...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And such thick, powerful legs, too.\nI shudder to think what its hooves\nwould do to us if it landed a solid kick...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['...No. I must have courage. If I\ncannot slay this beast, I will never\nbe recognized as an adult.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['R-right, then! I will lead the way\nwith my net. Here goes nothing!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Oh... I do believe it\ntore right through it...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Even with your help, to have failed\nso completely in my trial...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Forgive me, my friend.\nI know I mustn't wallow\nin failure and self-pity.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["A-aye, I must regroup. Consider what other\nways I might counter the beast's strengths...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I...I have struck upon an idea.\nA surefire way to bring low\nthe mountain goat...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Regrettably, however, it will\nrequire more money than I\nhave at present.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Therefore I must be more assertive...\nM-more aggressive in appealing\nto customers.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Calling out boldly to strangers is\nhardly my forte. Rather embarrassing,\nand quite terrifying as well...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But if it is what I must do to\nearn the coin I need...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Of course, your assistance\nwould be most appreciated.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Once again I must\nthank you, my friend.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['W-welcome...\nCome see the f-finest\nwares money can buy...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['C-come and see, come and see!\nAmazing oddities, curious curios,\nall on offer at reasonable prices!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oho, aren't you a spirited one?\nI do think I may have to peruse\nthese trinkets of yours. May I?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Incredible. I actually managed to sell my\nentire stock... With your help, of course.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And with the money I earned I was\nable to purchase this steel trap.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["A bit much, perhaps, but once\nI've caught the beast, I can bring\nto bear my secret weapon...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['A fan, believe it or not.\nThis I was taught by a\nhunter of this village.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['By waving it about, one can draw the\nattention of the goat and render it\nvulnerable to all manner of attack.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Once we've attended to our preparations,\nwe can go to face the beast.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I can hardly believe it.\nThe beast lies defeated at last...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Well done, Juan. 'Twas a\nfine demonstration of your\nplanning and skills.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Chief! You were watching?\nBut why are you even here?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Because it is my duty to bear witness to\nevery rite of passage. To see our youths\nprove themselves hunters grown.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Then...you are aware that I relied on\nothers to see the deed done...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["'Tis no simple matter to hunt a\nfearsome beast such as this alone.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And indeed, you enlisted the help\nof others to succeed in your task.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["That is all well, for recognizing one's\nown limitations and learning to rely\non others is a hallmark of maturity.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Not at all. By your deeds,\nyou have proven yourself a\nfull-fledged member of the tribe.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['No one individual achieves greatness alone.\nHelp others, and be helped in turn...\nThat is how you grow stronger together.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Thanks to you, I've come so far as\na hunter, and a merchant besides.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And while I intend to focus on my trade for\nnow, perhaps I can do so in your company?\nAs a member of <clan_name>.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It would be an honor to\naccompany you in your travels.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['O Sacred Flame, please lend\nthis pitiful cleric a hand...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I'm afraid I'm not cut out for clergy work,\nbut perhaps with your guidance...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ah. You saw all that just now, didn't you?\nHow embarrassing...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["My name's Telly, and as you may have\nguessed, I'm a cleric of the Sacred Flame...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Hmm, this is quite the predicament.\nWhat to do, what to do...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Or trying my best to be one, at least.\nThat's the trouble, you see...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I don't quite know the proper way to pray.\nOr, at least that's what all the learned\nmasters of the church tell me.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["If it keeps on like this, I'll be too\nashamed to look my parents or\nany of my siblings in the eye.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oh. I suppose I forgot to mention that\nI'm one of eight. We're octuplets, actually.\nThat's an awful lot of shame to go around.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["We've always been poor, so me and the others\ndecided we had to go out into the world and\nearn money as soon as we were able.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Clerics can go far in the church,\nand quickly...or so I thought.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["After all, isn't a cleric's job\npretty much just to pray?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And me, I pray all the time for all kinds of\nthings, making me an expert.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["...Or so I thought,\nbut it hasn't gone at all to plan.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I feel like I've tried so hard to be\nthe best cleric I can be, but it's\njust not enough...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I was planning to practice praying\nsome more, but since you're here...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Whatever I'm doing wrong,\nI'm sure you'll notice straightaway!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['O Sacred Flame,\nplease light my path...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['How was that? Pretty good, right?\nNothing at all strange or untoward?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I was quite earnest and I\nput my whole heart into it!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Grant me good health today and\ntomorrow and every day after...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["And while you're at it,\nmaybe send a little coin my way...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oh, and if I could enjoy a hot meal,\nthat'd be swell, too...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Huh?\nPraying for lots of things isn't proper?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But...I'm not really sure what\nit is I'm supposed to pray for...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Maybe if I had someone\nto show me how it's done...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Is there no one who can\nteach me how to pray properly...?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Hmm? What's a young cleric\nlike you doing out here?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Well, er... I've got a bit of\na dilemma on my hands.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["In that case, why not visit the church?\nThey're hosting a cleric from Flamesgrace\nat the moment.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I'm sure she'll be able to offer guidance.\nThough, far be it for me to tell\na cleric how to conduct his affairs.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Not at all, friend.\nI thank you for your counsel!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["This cleric sounds like a rather esteemed sort.\nI'm not sure if I'm up for meeting her alone.\nWould you be willing to accompany me?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Hello there, m-miss. You wouldn't\nhappen to be the cleric from\nFlamesgrace, would you...?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Ophilia, yes.\nA pleasure to make your acquaintance.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oh, um, I'm Telly.\nAnd nice to meet you too.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['So, Telly, how may I be\nof service to you this day?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ah, um... I was hoping I might\nask you a question? If that's all right.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['If it is within my power to aid you,\nI should be glad to do so.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["In that case... I'm a cleric, too, you see, but...\nI haven't quite got the hang of praying.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['So I was wondering...could you\nteach me how to pray properly?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Perhaps I might better understand\nif you showed me your...method.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['O Sacred Flame...I pray that you light my way\nand shepherd me through the dark...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['That you grant me days of plenty and\ngood health. That I never go hungry—\nnot once.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Oh, but not just me, of course.\nEveryone should get that. And, um...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["If you could send a little extra coin\nmy way, I'd be grateful. Just a few bits.\nI'm not greedy, really.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Haha... Truly, you do not hesitate to\nplace yourself at the mercy of powers divine...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['That said, prayer is more than a plea\nfor salvation.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It should be an expression of gratitude\nfor the blessings you have, and reverence\nfor the Sacred Flame.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I can tell you're thinking awfully hard about what\nto ask for, but perhaps you should focus more on\nputting into words how thankful your are.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ah, that makes sense.\nI've just been asking for things, haven't I?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Praying is a lot more complicated\nthan I thought, I have to say.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But I'll take your advice to heart\nand give it another go!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['O Sacred Flame... I thank you for always\nwatching over and keeping me safe...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Huh. You know, Miss Ophilia, that feels\na little better. I think I might've gotten it right.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But do not succumb to pride, and remember\nthat prayer is first and foremost an expression\nof gratitude and reverence.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oh, of course.\nI'll bear that in mind.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But you've nothing to worry about, I'm sure!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I've got you and the Sacred Flame\non my side, after all!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I have to tell you, I've been feeling wonderful\nlately. The power of prayer, perhaps?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['By the way, did you know who she was?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ophilia, I mean. She's the daughter\nof Archbishop Josef himself!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Not his real daughter, to be fair.\nShe's adopted. Still, to think that she\nlearned from an honest-to-gods archbishop...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['No wonder she knows all about prayer.\nKnows all the tricks to do it just right.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["And she's a beauty besides! Though her\nkind heart and spiritual knowledge\nis more praiseworthy, I realize...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Truly, though, it is the work of the\nSacred Flame, bringing us together.\nMy prayers were heard and answered...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Ah. You're right!\nThat was dangerous, just now. Almost\nsuccumbed to pride, and we can't have that!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Anyway, I've got a full day of praying\nahead of me. Wish me luck!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Be thankful, be thankful.\nFeelings of gratitude and gratefulness...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['With just a touch of an ask thrown in.\nJust a touch...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['What do you think? Did my prayer\nreach the burning ears of the gods?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I hate to admit it, but even I know I'm\ncoming up short. I can't seem to\nconcentrate and pray properly after all...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I've got to nip this in the bud, and quickly, or\nI'm done for. Time to go and see Ophilia again!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But that's the right thing to do, isn't it?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["When in doubt, go to the experts. It's\nmuch faster to ask them for help than\nto continue struggling with a problem.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["And besides, she was so nice to us before.\nI'm sure she'll be more than happy to help\nus out again!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Excuse me, Miss Ophilia.\nDo you have a moment?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Oh, Telly.\nIs everything all right?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Well, no, actually. Maybe I should\nstart at the beginning...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['...Thank you for sharing\nyour story with me, Telly.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I think I understand now why you are so\nconcerned about praying properly.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I just want to do my best to ensure that\nmy words are at least heard...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But when I start to think about it,\nit's all I can think about.\nThe worry. The fear.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["What should I do to regain my focus?\nI'm completely at a loss...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But you can surely show me the way,\ncan't you? Teach me the correct method?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Telly...\nI cannot simply teach you how to pray.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['What? Why not!?\nHave I done something wrong?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['How about this? We will practice\npraying together. Come with me.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But, you're not going to tell me how to do it?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['So, what was it like to pray together\nwith another?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['It was so mysterious! It felt as though\nmy words might have really been heard.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But, what I don't understand is why I was\nable to pray so well in your company.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['How do you feel when you pray alone?\nWhat thoughts are in your mind?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Be thankful, be grateful.\nI try to convey those feelings,\njust like you taught me.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']

['But then I start to think about my family and\npeople like them. About all the things that would\nmake their lives better, and I start asking for them...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Now, tell me how you felt when praying\nwith me. What was different this time?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I was worried about disturbing you\nor doing something to offend...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['When praying with me, you were more\nconscious of my presence, and\ntherefore more respectful. More humble.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["A humbler, more gentle heart speaks\nwith greater clarity and purity of purpose,\ndon't you think?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['If we beseech the divine whensoever we\nare troubled, regardless of circumstance,\nthen the act of prayer loses all meaning.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['We must strive to do all that we can within\nour own power, and only when we are in\ngreat need entreat the gods for deliverance.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['...Not because they will refuse to answer,\nbut because we will never discover our true\npotential if we do not try to be our best selves.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['...I feel as though I learned a\ngreat deal about prayer.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Wonderful, then.\nI hope it serves you well in your studies.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Thank you! I know I've still got a lot to\nlearn, but I'll do my very best!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I hope I can turn to you in the future as well.\nThough, I suppose I can always turn to prayer—', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Whoops.\nOnly if worst comes to worst, that is!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Care to share a meal with me?\nThe Sacred Flame compels you!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I'm Pearl, by the way.\nCleric of the Order of the Sacred Flame.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Care to share a meal with me?\nThe Sacred Flame compels you!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Besides, I'm paying.\nWhat a lucky day for you.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['The tavern here in Clearbrook\nis quite good I hear.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["They say the cook there, Magg, is\nvery skilled at his craft. He's one of\nmy top candidates for a husband.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["That's right. I'm conducting my own\nsearch for an appropriate husband.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['There are several candidates so far,\nand Magg is one of them.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["A cook would make a good husband,\ndon't you think? Oh, just imagine...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But why imagine when I can\nsample the goods for myself?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Naturally, if I don't like what he has\nto offer, he'll be unceremoniously\nwithdrawn from the running.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Ask yourself, "What dishes do I have\nthe most confidence in?" and then\nmake them for me.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Hmph, they were all\ncommonplace dishes.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Bean soup, herbed chicken.\nSausages, fried fish...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['The soup was rich in flavor, yet\nwithout any overpowering beany odors...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['As for the meat, it was perfectly seasoned.\nJust the right amount of salt and herbs.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Well, you asked for what I\nhad the most confidence in.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['So I made you some\nhome-cooked classics.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["If you had ordered what you would've\nliked to eat, I bet I could've made\nsomething even tastier.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["There's nothing better than ordering\nwhat you want just the way you want it.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["If you'll excuse me,\nI've got other customers.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['But he certainly can cook.\nI guess that means he passes...for now.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['I need a few more bites at his apple\nbefore I reach any conclusions.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["What? It's just due diligence!\nI'm not craving more of his cooking\nif that's what you're implying.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I simply don't have\nenough information yet...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Which means you're coming back\nhere with me again. And we'll have\na lovely time, got it!?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I think it's about that time again, eh?\nStomach's starting to rumble?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Maybe I could buy\nyou another meal!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["I'm saying we should go get\nmore of Magg's cooking!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['What? I have to know if his cooking\nis really that good! He might have\njust gotten lucky!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Like I said, he's only\na candidate husband!", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['And there are several\nother candidates still!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["It's deserted in here...\nAre you closed?", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Haven't been able to get my\nhands on any wild strawberries.\nI need them for my desserts.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['A hunter usually gathers them\nfor me, but they got sick.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["The place they grow is pretty dangerous.\nLots of monsters. So I can't go myself...", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Wow, I go to the trouble of gracing\nyou with my presence again...', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["But I don't want to open if I can't\nprovide food up to my standards.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Well then, we'll just have to go\nand get some for you.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['You just make sure the first round of\ndesserts comes straight to us, got it?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['So then, where can we\nget wild strawberries?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['On the Clearbrook Traverse,\nas I understand.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Look! Wild strawberries! Red and\nripe and looking scrumptious!', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Magg should be satisfied with these.', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
['Wild strawberries, as requested.\nWill these do?', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
["Oh, no, not at all! It's just...\nYou went to the trouble of picking\nones all of the same color.", '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
